title: Wild Justice
description: A Peach and Blake Mystery - When Tamsin Hayes decides to kill her husband, she sets in train a series of events she could never have predicted. For there is a seedy side to Tim Hayes, which the police are already investigating when he is violently murdered. Was he dispatched by the wife who had vowed to rid herself of him? Or one of the other suspects who emerge once DCI Percy Peach and DS Lucy Blake begin their investigation?
author: J.M. Gregson
